job.name: Azure_HDInsight_Spark_Submit_Application
job.description: A workflow that uses SSH to execute a shell script in the head node of a HDInsight Spark Cluster.

script.code: mkdir -p /tmp/spark-application cd /tmp/spark-application wget -nc https://activeeon-spark-sample-apps.s3.eu-west-3.amazonaws.com/spark-examples_2.11-2.4.6.4.1.4.8.jar spark-submit --class org.apache.spark.examples.SparkPi --master yarn spark-examples_2.11-2.4.6.4.1.4.8.jar

# Get the SSH user and password to log into the remote machine sshUser=$variables_SSH_USR sshPassword=$variables_SSH_PWD remoteMachine=$variables_REMOTE_MACHINE
# Prepare the script to execute in the remote machine chmod a+x scripts/script.sh
# Printing the script echo "============== The script to be executed ==========================" cat scripts/script.sh echo "============================================================" echo "Executing the script remotely in the machine "$remoteMachine
if ! command -v sshpass &> /dev/null then echo "sshpass could not be found, using a sshpass docker container"
# copy the script to the remote machine docker run --rm -i -v $(pwd)/scripts:/scripts ictu/sshpass -p $sshPassword scp -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no /scripts/script.sh $sshUser@$remoteMachine:/tmp/script.sh
# execute the script in the remote machine docker run --rm -i -v $(pwd)/scripts:/scripts ictu/sshpass -p $sshPassword ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no $sshUser@$remoteMachine "/tmp/script.sh"
else echo "sshpass found"
# copy the script to the remote machine sshpass -p $sshPassword scp -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no scripts/script.sh $sshUser@$remoteMachine:/tmp/script.sh
# execute the script in the remote machine sshpass -p $sshPassword ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no $sshUser@$remoteMachine "/tmp/script.sh" fi
